text:
Hi everyone, I'm new to HubSpot and I'm trying to build a react landing page. I'm a little lost.

Can I create the app with create-react-app or do I need to start with hs create react-app?

When I start with hs create react-app, after yarn start, in which file do I view the application?

HubSpot.config.yml is at the root

If anyone has an example I would appreciate it :)
